articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Sympathy to Italian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Sympathy to Italian President
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of sympathy to Giorgio Napolitano, Italian president, on May 25 in connection with the recent earthquake that hit Italy, causing huge casualties and big material losses. 
					 Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the president and victims of the country, hoping that the Italian government would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster and bring the living of the people in the afflicted area to normal at an early date.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Learns about Farming
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Learns about Farming
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on May 25 learned about the farming in Yonan and Paechon counties of South Hwanghae Province on the spot.
					 All the agricultural workers of the counties are gaining achievements in the ongoing rice transplanting with ardent patriotism to bring about a decisive turn in settling the food issue as befitting the masters of the country's granary true to the high intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The premier went round the Ohyon and Suwon cooperative farms and other places.
					
					 He underlined the need for the farms to carry through the behests of President Kim Il Sung and thereby continue glorifying the honor of the units of his on-the-spot guidance. He underscored the need to positively study and introduce high yields of seeds as intended by the WPK so as to set a model in grain production. He stressed the need to readjust tractors and rice transplanting machines well to keep them in full-capacity and for relevant units to provide substantial fertilizers according to periods.
					
					 Learning about water storage and provision of Lake Kuam and the Ryeui Reservoir, he underscored the need to provide substantial water to paddy and non-paddy fields as it does not rain at present and thus take concrete measures for preventing drought.
					
					 On May 24 the premier went round the Samjigang Cooperative Farm in Jaeryong County.
					
					  It is associated with the leadership provided by the President and leader Kim Jong Il. It has completed rice transplanting in the right time while giving priority to harrowing according to the features of soil and thoroughly ensuring the number of rice plants for phyong and the number for rice plants. The agricultural workers of the farm are turning out as one in weeding and preventing drought, not content with their proud achievements.
					
					 The premier stressed the need to set a model of the country in farming this year, too, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il and thus remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un with rice.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Zhao Hengsheng, manager of wax replica studio of the arts expo center in Shaoshan city of Hunan Province of China, on the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK embassy in Beijing on May 17.

articles.title: Pomminryon S. Headquarters Vice-chairman Tours Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
Pomminryon S. Headquarters Vice-chairman Tours Mt. Kumgang
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), toured Mt. Kumgang between May 22 and 25.
					 He was marveled at the fantastic scenery of Mt. Kumgang, touring myriad-shaped peaks, Kuryong Falls, Lagoon Samil and Sea-Kumgang.
					
					 He had pleasant rest, enjoying a bird's-eye view of beauty spots including thick forests, deep valleys and famous falls. 
					
					 Meanwhile, he visited Wonsan University of Agriculture and Ullim Falls.

articles.title: Vietnamese Paper Editor-in-Chief Gives Impressions of DPRK
articles.content:
Vietnamese Paper Editor-in-Chief Gives Impressions of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Thuan Huu, editor-in-chief of the Vietnamese paper Nhan Dan, said that he was deeply impressed to visit the DPRK. The Vietnamese people will always stand in one and the same trench with the Korean people, he stressed. 
					 He continued: This is my first visit to the DPRK.
					
					 I was greatly impressed to tour various places of this country.
					
					 The Korean people have registered great successes in the struggle for socialist construction and national reunification under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They have firmly defended socialism from all sorts of moves of the U.S. imperialists and their allies.
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine socialist country where everything is to serve the people.
					
					 Broad working masses fully use the Grand People's Study House in their study.
					
					  The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital equipped with modern medical apparatuses is called by women their parents' house.
					
					 The children of the DPRK are bringing their hopes and talents into full bloom under the deep loving care for the younger generation.
					
					 The E-library of Kim Il Sung University is high in its level.
					
					 This clearly shows the advantages of the socialist educational system in the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people are accelerating socialist construction, weathering difficulties in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					 I hope the Korean people will achieve greater successes in socialist construction under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The Korean people rendered sincere support and encouragement to the Vietnamese people in their anti-U.S. struggle for national salvation. The Communist Party and people of Vietnam always remember this.
					
					 We will condemn the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and extend solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle.
					
					 We will widely introduce the heroic struggle of the Korean people and make a positive contribution to deepening the friendship between the two peoples.

articles.title: DPRK Guitar Quartet Perform at Moscow Int'l Festival
articles.content:
DPRK Guitar Quartet Perform at Moscow Int'l Festival
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK children's guitar quartet of the Kyongsang Kindergarten of the DPRK performed at the 9th international festival "Moscow welcomes friends" held in Moscow, winning a high acclaim of the audience. 
					 The festival brought together thousands of international concours winners and gifted juvenile musicians of over 160 organizations from at least 40 countries including the DPRK.
					
					 The festival's opening performance was given at the theatre "House of Music" in Moscow on May 20.
					
					 Among the performers were children of 15 groups from the DPRK, Russia, Ukraine, Georgia and Uzbekistan.
					
					 Korean children including An Il Hun and Kim Ta Yon played the Korean folk song "Arirang" with refined skill and exciting rhythms.
					
					When their playing was over, the audience broke into loud applause. At the audience's request for an encore, Korean children played "a collection of world famous songs," breaking the custom of the festival allowing one organization to present no more than a number. 
					
					 After their presentation was encored, there were more requests for encore and enthusiastic applause. 
					
					 Russian artistes and audience met the Korean children and congratulated them on their successful playing.
					
					 Shirman, executive section chief of the Vladimir Spibakov Charity Fund, said as follows:
					
					 The children's presentation was so splendid that it is hard to say that it was children's performance. It fully showcased the level of art education in the DPRK.
					
					 Professors at Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory and members of the preparatory committee of the festival said they were deeply admired by the training of talents and the good educational policy in the DPRK, expressing hope that the DPRK would send many gifted juvenile artistes in the future.

articles.title: KPA Military Band Gives Opening Performance in Russia
articles.content:
KPA Military Band Gives Opening Performance in Russia
 Pyongyang May 26 (KCNA) -- The military band of the Korean People's Army performed in the first International Military Band Festival of the Far Eastern Region in Khabarovsk of Russia on May 23.
					 This festival brought together the military bands of the DPRK and Russia and other countries in Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The festival opened with the performance of the military band of the KPA.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by VIPs of Khabarovsk Territory government and the administration of Khabarovsk City, those concerned of the festival and citizens from all walks of life and media persons in the territory.
					
					 The minister of Culture of the territory government in a congratulatory speech expressed the heartfelt thanks to the leadership of the DPRK for sending the military band of the KPA well known as the most famous military band.
					
					 The vice-mayor of the administration of the city expressed the conviction that the vigorous sounds of trumpets for advance by the band would resound in the whole of the Far Eastern region as it instill the spirit of advance and zeal into the people.
					
					 The band presented "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", immortal revolutionary hymns, and wind music fully representing the militant spirit of the KPA and its invincible might with lively and pleasant melodies.
					
					 The performance was highly applauded by the audience for unimaginable excellence, vigor and high artistic skills.

articles.title: Koreans Are Out to Fight Drought
articles.content:
Koreans Are Out to Fight Drought
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Officials and working people across the country are all out to prevent damage by drought.
					 The Cabinet and the Ministry of Agriculture took emergency measures to prevent the drought-related damage and all sectors and units are meticulously carrying out organizational and political work to fight drought in a massive manner.
					
					 Rural areas are pushing ahead with the work to repair and readjust wells, pools and tube-wells, keep water-pumping and dry-field irrigation equipment in full-capacity operation and irrigate all fields with water collected through damming and digging of river-beds.
					
					 North Phyongan and Hwanghae provinces are making good use of existing irrigation system while watering the fields prone to drought damage after finishing the repair of pools, tube-wells, etc.
					
					 Jongju, Sariwon, Thaechon, Ryongchon, Pongsan and other cities and counties are concentrating labor power on watering the drought-hit fields of corn, potato, wheat and barley first.
					
					 Working people and supporters in South Hwanghae and Phyongan provinces are watering lots of fields every day.
					
					 Rural farms in Nampho City and Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces are successfully watering fields by organizing labor forces to suit to their specific conditions and making an effective use of water resources.
					
					 The rural farms near Pyongyang are watering the fields through diverse methods including furrow and water-sprinkling irrigation systems after readjusting irrigation facilities.
					
					 All rural farms are frequently weeding and ploughing as required by technical regulations in order to keep soil moist, while applying amino acid compound fertilizer and humate good for resisting drought.

articles.title: Pyongyang Is Waiting for KCU Delegates
articles.content:
Pyongyang Is Waiting for KCU Delegates
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is now busy with preparations to welcome the delegates to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU), which falls on June 6.
					 The e-library at Kim Il Sung University will give a special service to the delegates through introductory documentaries and modern visual aids so as to implant in their minds the noble intention of leader Kim Jong Il, who hoped that the KCU members would grow up to be reliable cores of the Songun revolution while looking out over the world with their feet planted in their land.
					
					 The Pyongyang Circus prepares aerial stunts "Flying Girls" and "Fliers" and other diverse programs for acrobatic performances to be given by acrobats of the circus and students of Pyongyang Acrobatic School. Also put on the stage will be comedic and animal feats to delight the delegates.
					
					 Similar preparations are also being made at the Central Zoo for those delegates to enjoy a pleasant time during their tour of Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, the National Symphony Orchestra, well-known to the world, steps up the preparations of celebration performance.
					
					 Choe Ki Hyok, a concert master of the Orchestra, said:
					
					 "There has been no instance in the world that a symphony orchestra prepared special performance for schoolchildren.
					
					 In fact, a symphony has long served only for privileged classes throughout the world, but in our country it serves the working masses. The topnotch instrumentalists are to give their performance in honor of sons and daughters of the working people.
					
					 We will give pleasure to exemplary KCU members, by ensuring successful performance on the highest level."
					
					 The Kaeson Youth Park Funfair has finished its preparations to receive the little delegates.
					
					 Service workers of public catering establishments, including Okryu and Chongryu restaurants, strive to prepare tasty meals for the delegates.
					
					 During their stay in Pyongyang the KCU delegates will be received as state guests wherever they go.

articles.title: New Species of Fishes Inhabited in Central Zoo of DPRK
articles.content:
New Species of Fishes Inhabited in Central Zoo of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- More than 100 ornamental fishes of 10 odd species have been recently inhabited at the aquarium of the Central Zoo in Pyongyang.
					They include kissing gooraml (Heostoma temminki), tiger barb (Barbus tetrazona), sucker catfish (Hypostomus plecostomus) and speckled scalare (Pterophyllum eimeni). 
					
					 The 7 to 9 centimeter-long rainbow fish (Melanotaenla maccullochi) lives in Australia and Papua New Guinea and 5 centimeter-long black tetra (Gymnocorymbus ternetzi) in Paraguay.

articles.title: New Picture Album Published in DPRK
articles.content:
New Picture Album Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Cheyuk Sinmun of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently brought out a picture album "Juche-based Physical Culture Steadily Developing under the Care of the Great Sun" to mark the centenary of President Kim Il Sung's birth.
					 The picture album gives a glimpse of the feats Kim Il Sung performed for the development of the nation's physical culture. He matured his plans on building popular sports under socialism during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and promoted the physical culture in practice.
					
					 It also carries photos showing the precious feats of leader Kim Jong Il, who further developed the Juche-based sports into an example of socialist physical culture, and the activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un energetically guiding the sports field with his will to turn the DPRK into a sports power.
					
					 Contained in the album, consisting of seven chapters, are more than 90 photos of the peerlessly great men and nearly 3,000 pictures showing the developing physical culture of the country.

articles.title: Online Health Service System Completed
articles.content:
Online Health Service System Completed
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Chongjin University of Medicine in North Hamgyong Province of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has completed online health service system for the province.
					 The system ensures close relations between the university and hospitals in the province and real-time tele-education and tele-clinical practice. Also, consultations of doctors, conditions of patient and experiment and test indexes can be analyzed to take necessary measures through the system.
					
					 All processes of operation can be observed in real time so as to promote scientific researches and practical ability.
					
					 The system helps arrange urgent consultations between teachers and doctors, scientific interchange, scientific and technological seminar and dissemination of know-how in time and provide medical service with inhabitants.

articles.title: Environmental Protection Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Environmental Protection Encouraged in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Environmental Protection Institute under the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has been stepping up the researches to remove air pollution and conserve clean water and forest ecology. 
					 Ri Kyong Sim, director of the Institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The Institute has already made big achievements in the researches into environmental protection.
					
					 It has steadily updated the support program for air environmental management to correctly assess the level of air pollution in Pyongyang and prevent possible air pollution.
					
					 It finished making a design of the equipment to arrest above 98 percent of dust and harmful gas from the industrial establishments across the country and is now pressing ahead with its manufacture. 
					
					 The Institute developed an additive to gasoline to reduce auto exhaust fumes and succeeded in inventing a pathogenic waste matter disposal device. 
					
					 An environment-friendly waste water treatment plant has been built at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, which is to remove oil from industrial spent water in reliance on plants.
					
					 On the basis of scientific selection of protective species of plants, the Institute wrote the book "Collection of Plants in the DPRK" (extinctive and rare plants), which is conducive to protection of biodiversity.
					
					 At present the Institute is intensifying the researches into eco-environment characteristics and rational management of natural parks in the country.

articles.title: Sijungho Sanatorium
articles.content:
Sijungho Sanatorium
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Sijungho Sanatorium is located 1.5 kilometers from sea-turned Lake Sijung in Thongchon County, Kangwon Province of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The lake, three square kilometers in area and 10 kilometers in circumference, boasts of beautiful scenery and healthful mud.
					
					 The Sijungho Sanatorium, fully equipped with medical facilities, serves treatment of various diseases by use of mud in the lake.
					
					 Along with mud treatment, the sanatorium is known as serving physiotherapy and climatotherapy. It has rooms for high-frequency, low-frequency, ray and massage treatment. Sea and sun bath is a kind of remedies.
					
					 Jon Sung Hui (58), a woman living in Jung District of Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "The mud of Lake Sijung is very efficacious. I stay here for scores of days each year in consecutive two years to heal the aftereffect of cerebral thrombosis. Now I feel better."
					
					 An old man living in Wonsan said that rice-gruel and peppery soup mixed with fish taken in Sijung Lake are exquisite flavor.
					
					 Boating and angling are one of main entertainments in the sanatorium.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Lee Myung Bak Group Cancer-like Entity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Lee Myung Bak Group Cancer-like Entity
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Nothing can be expected in the inter-Korean relations and no one can predict what a horrible disaster the nation will face as long as the Lee Myung Bak group is allowed to cooperate with foreign forces against the DPRK, escalate confrontation with it and crack down upon reunification movement.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The north-south relations which were favorably developing have been held back, confrontation escalated, national issue reduced to a plaything of outsiders and the situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to the brink of a war due to the Lee group serving the U.S. in its moves to stifle the DPRK. This is the reality at present, the article, notes, and goes on:
					
					 There was a confrontation maniac who was rejected and censured by the nation for building a concrete wall to divide the country in the bitter history of the nation's division. But there was no such an outrageous traitor who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK as Lee.
					
					 Terming the Lee group one of confrontation maniacs rare in the history of national division and a group of hideous traitors, the article continues:
					
					 It is self-evident that the improved ties between the north and the south can never be expected as long as the group of traitors is allowed to remain in force.
					
					 Coming back in south Korea is the past era of confrontation, fascist dark era when people were thrown into a jail for uttering a word reunification.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak group should be eliminated in order to save the destiny of the nation from crisis and achieve reunification and peace of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Attaching Importance to Ideological Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Attaching Importance to Ideological Work
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea is an invincible party as it has victoriously led the revolution and construction by dint of ideology by holding fast to the line of giving importance to the ideological work.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a by-lined article.
					
					 The ideological work is the lifeline of the WPK and guarantees its invincible might, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK has steadily steered the revolution and construction, guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. The monolithic ideology has been firmly established throughout the party and all its members live and struggle as required by the ideology, thoroughly armed with the great Juche idea, Songun idea. This is the true picture of the WPK demonstrating its dignity and might as the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, remaining unshaken by any storm and stress.
					
					 The imperialists' bourgeois ideology and corrupt lifestyle can never work on the army and people of the DPRK who believe in the ideology of the President and Kim Jong Il only and follow them. No force on earth can break the single-minded unity in the DPRK united close around the Party and the leader in thought and purpose no matter how the situation, conditions and environment may change.
					
					 The cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism has entered a new higher phase for dying the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism at present thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un made public his work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche," thus proclaiming the process for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as a supreme programme of the WPK.  Herein lies the unshakable will of Kim Jong Un to wage a more dynamic struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the future, too, just as the WPK has made efforts to model the whole society on Kimilsungism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: KCNA Calls for Vigilance against Food Domination Strategy
articles.content:
KCNA Calls for Vigilance against Food Domination Strategy
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A worldwide food crisis is threatening mankind. 
					Nearly a billion of people in the world are suffering from malnutrition and millions of children die of hunger every year. 
					
					The food prices in the world skyrocketed 71 percent in one year from July 2010 to July 2011. 
					
					Every year more than 10 million children are seriously undernourished and half of them die of hunger.
					
					Food prices steadily rise and the number of people suffering from chronic hunger is on the daily increase. 
					
					The worldwide food crisis is attributable to the imperialists' food domination strategy. 
					
					The imperialists leave no stone unturned in their moves to put food production and supply system in other countries in confusion. 
					
					The fluctuation of food prices is attributable to the politicization of food. 
					
					The politicization of food is aimed at using food as an important lever for implementing foreign policy strategy of a country by taking advantage of its property as a strategic material and thus influencing other countries and, furthermore, putting other countries under its control. 
					
					In the middle of the 1970s when the agricultural production increased thanks to the successful green revolution and the food prices dropped, the imperialists began making arrangements for a food war to control all the food stocks behind the scene and flout the destiny of mankind. 
					
					Protectionism which Western countries have persistently pursued is a typical policy for food domination. 
					
					Pursuant to this policy, Western countries blocked developing countries from advancing to their markets by applying high tariffs on farm products. 
					
					Meanwhile, they enforced export subsidies system whereby their farm products were dumped on the markets of developing countries. 
					
					Consequently, the farm products of developing countries were nudged out of international food markets, creating striking imbalance. The West controlled markets and manipulated food prices as it pleased. 
					
					So, an increasing number of countries opted to import "cheap" food of the West or depending on its aid rather than investing money in agriculture. 
					
					Under the signboard of "aid" and "fund for debt relief" the imperialists used "surplus farm products" created through protectionism as a bait for imposing the West's view of value on developing countries. 
					
					A sum total of such "aid" and "fund for debt relief" was less than one fourth or one fifth of the loss suffered by developing countries due to the unfair trade with the West. 
					
					Monopoly capitalists' grabbing of farm land caused a serious hindrance to the world food production and was another factor of skyrocketing food prices. 
					
					Through their predatory protectionism and farmland grabbing, the Western imperialists have taken the bulk of the world food products and many developing countries including African countries, main food exporters in the 1960s and the1970s, were reduced to food importers. 
					
					Bio-fuel production brisk in the U.S. and other Western countries is worsening the food crisis. 
					
					The U.S. pays six billion U.S. dollars and Europe four billion Euros as subsidies every year to encourage monopolies in the race for bio-fuel production. 
					
					It is reported that an ordinary car in the U.S. needs 200kg of corn to produce bio-fuel for its tank. 
					
					The quantity of grain consumed by machines in the U.S. and Europe is equivalent to the food for half billion people. 
					
					The mass production of bio-fuel in 2007 reduced the amount of reserve grain to the lowest in several decades whereas food prices sharply rose. 
					
					It is the unanimous view of the news analysts that the main target of the unprecedented bio-fuel policy of the U.S. and the West are OPEC member nations. 
					
					State monopoly capitalism is the arch criminal which sparked off the present food crisis as it creates disorderly speculation and extremely chaos under the reign of the jungle law. 
					
					In 2008 when a financial crisis broke out in the U.S. owing to the collapse of real estate market and it hit the capitalist world as a whole, the monopoly capitalists sought a way out of it in investing money in food production, not in metal and energy industries which required relatively high advance payment and invited danger. 
					
					Taking advantage of the food instability, not only food monopolies but various other monopolies vied with each other in throwing themselves into food speculation. 
					
					This resulted in the competition in money-making by food and the leapfrogging of food prices. 
					
					It is none other than the monopoly capitalists who gained big profits by bringing food disaster to mankind. 
					
					At present when the imperialists are deepening the food crisis in a desperate bid to threaten the lifeline of mankind and subjugate other countries and nations, to settle the food shortage is not just a matter of eating but an issue on which hinges whether a nation protects its sovereignty and dignity or becomes slaves. 
					
					Dry bread at home is better than roast meat abroad. 
					
					Self-sufficiency in food is the only way out. It is necessary to meet the imperialists' challenge by concerted efforts. 
					
					It is the genuine way of solving the food problem for a nation to do farming well by its own efforts in its own land and attain self-sufficiency in food.

articles.title: S. Korea Busy Introducing US-Made Military Hardware
articles.content:
S. Korea Busy Introducing US-Made Military Hardware
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are mulling introducing multi-functional helicopters and Harpoon missile from the U.S.
					 The puppet government is pushing ahead with a plan for the introduction of those weapons for 1.084 billion U.S. dollars, according to CBS of south Korea on May 25.
					
					 The U.S. Department of Defense said this plan was submitted to U.S. Congress.
					
					 The funds spent by rat-like Lee Myung Bak for purchasing weapons since his seizure of power tops the world list of arms introduction.       
					
					 This indicates what phase the puppet warmongers' preparations for a preemptive attack on the north have reached.

articles.title: Abolition of SL Called in South Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of SL Called in South Korea
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and social organizations including the Solidarity for Realizing Labor Liberation  and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law" (SL) on May 23 held a press conference outside the building of the puppet Seoul district police agency, strongly condemning the authorities for violating the freedom of political activities.
					 The Seoul district police agency on May 22 made a forced search of offices and server of the Solidarity for Liberation as well as its management enterprises on charges of violation of SL and consequently arrested and detained its four members.
					
					 The speakers at the press conference asserted the suppression of the solidarity was just as same as quelling the just desire of the working people for a new society where the popular masses have become masters.
					
					 The police crackdown on labor movement organizations following a round of searches of the Unified Progressive Party building and confiscation of the party documents are clearly repression targeting the progressive and labor movement, they said.
					
					 SL merely serves as a means for maintaining authority of the capital and regime, they said, terming the existence of the evil law for over 63 years since its enactment a tragedy of the south Korean society.
					
					 They strongly urged the authorities to repeal SL that violates the freedom of thinking and political activities and immediately release the unreasonably arrested prisoners.

articles.title: Contribution to Reunification of Nation Called for
articles.content:
Contribution to Reunification of Nation Called for
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea including media persons and religionists established the Minjok Ilbo Memorial Society on May 23.
					 An inaugural meeting of the society took place at the Press Center in Seoul on the same day.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that the objective of the society is to reinforce the committee for probing the truth behind Jo Yong Su of Minjok Ilbo as required by the prevailing situation in a bid to eradicate irregularities and corruption and strengthen the pro-reunification democratic forces. 
					
					 They recalled that the Park Chung-Hee dictatorial forces forced Minjok Ilbo to stop publication though it conducted activities for awakening people and arousing them to a sacred struggle for the country's reunification in 1961 and punished its Manager Jo Yong Su.
					
					 They accused Park Geun Hye, daughter of that dictator, of going reckless in her bid to become "president".
					
					 It is of very great importance to establish the society under this grim situation, they said, calling upon all the Koreans to make a contribution to the reunification of the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Gagging on Press
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Gagging on Press
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A "Joint Measure Committee for the  Release of Representative Ri Chang Gi and Reporter Han Song of Jaju Minbo and Frustration of Gag on the Press" grouping civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Seoul Central District Court on May 22 at which it accused the puppet authorities of suppressing media.
					 Speakers at the press conference chided the authorities for cracking down upon them after indicting them on charges of violating the "Security Law."
					
					 They conducted press activities in order to inform the people of truth, prompted by their desire to hold in check the war racket which has mounted since the emergence of the present "government", ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula, improve the inter-Korean relations and make a contribution to reunification, they said, adding the activities of Jaju Minbo were just as they were aimed at ending confrontation and achieving national reunification, the desire of the Koreans.
					
					 They renewed their will to wage a dynamic struggle for getting all the prisoners of conscience including Ri and Han released and an evil law abolished.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Fine Art Work Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Fine Art Work Exhibition Held in China
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and fine art work exhibition took place in China from May 18 to 22 to celebrate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at its venue were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, books and photos of the undying revolutionary careers and feats of the peerlessly great persons and those introducing the Korean people building a thriving socialist nation and fine art works associated with their creative talents.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were officials of the Liuhe County People's Government and the Liuhe Economic Development Zone of Nanjing City and its masses. Present there on invitation were a staff member of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and a Korean official working in China.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The cultural exchange between the DPRK and China will positively contribute to steadily developing the friendly relations provided by the leaders of elder generations of the two countries, speakers said, adding that the Sino-DPRK friendship will be everlasting.

articles.title: Branch of Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association Meets
articles.content:
Branch of Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association Meets
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association took place on May 12.
					 Informed there were participation of members of the branch in the celebrations for the centenary of President Kim Il Sung's birth and last year's activities of the branch. It also discussed its action program in the future.
					
					 It elected new members of the branch leadership. Ghulam Rabbani was elected chairman of the branch.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was carried by the Nepali paper Rahasha on May 17.
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, clarifies the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for land management and indicates the general orientation and task to facelift the land of the county as befitting that of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism carried the main gist of the work on its bulletin No. 70.
					
					 His work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was carried by the Liaoning Joson Munbo of China on May 18.
					
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies the idea that it is a principled requirement for victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Regional Organization Blasts Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Regional Organization Blasts Lee Myung Bak
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on May 19 posted on its Internet website an article titled "Living corpse, root cause of nation's misfortune".
					 Puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea is called by many nicknames as he has committed worst acts during his office, the website said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean people call Lee a liar, sleep-walker, crook and ex-convict as he seized power by deceiving them with honeyed words. People are ridiculing him as a bastard whose nationality is unclear and a parrot of the U.S. as he gives priority to the interests of the U.S. and Japan before those of the nation. They are calling him a total ignoramus, underwit with only 2MB IQ, useless dark soul, thief, swindler of real estates and kingpin of bribe as he measures everything with money, with no knowledge of politics.
					
					 He is also branded as a hypocrite, root cause of war, cancer-like being in the way of reunification and maniac escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen. He is cursed and denounced as he lacerated the Korean people when they suffered the greatest loss and took issue with the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK which the Koreans regard more valuable than their lives, in particular.
					
					 Days are numbered for rat-like Lee Myung Bak, psychopath and human reject, to face stern judgment by the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita campo de obras de establecimientos de servicio publico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita campo de obras de establecimientos de servicio publico
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el campo de construccion del Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Ryugyongwon y el Patinadero al Aire Libre del Pueblo.
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, el Maximo Dirigente recorrio el Complejo Ryugyongwon. 
					
					Pasando revista a la parte interior y la exterior, se entero de los detalles de construccion. 
					
					En el bano-sauna de pino con fuerte olor a resina, se mostro satisfecho de la calidad de construccion del suelo y paredes. 
					
					Elogiando la gran dimension de los salones de descanso al lado de los banos, instruyo colocar ahi los televisores para que los clientes puedan verlos refrescandose.
					
					Subio hasta el cuarto y ultimo piso donde dio la tarea de utilizar los espacios de modo eficiente. 
					
					Ryugyongwon estuvo bajo la atencion especial del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo y asevero que si se termina esta obra, sera materializado otro legado mas del Dirigente. 
					
					Ryugyongwon tiene una forma y contenido arquitectonicos novedosos y peculiares y esta en alto nivel desde el diseno hasta la ejecucion, evaluo y recalco que los constructores militares deben terminar la obra hasta el dia de victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (27 de julio) para poner ese establecimiento a la disposicion del pueblo.
					
					Acto seguido, el Maximo Dirigente estuvo en el Patinadero al Aire Libre del Pueblo. 
					
					Gracias a la lucha heroica de los constructores militares, se hizo posible edificar las facilidades de servicios del deporte como este patinadero, dijo el apreciando los meritos de aquellos. 
					
					Ya que este patinadero tiene el caracter publico, hay que acondicionar bien el puesto de prestacion de patines y preparar sin falta el taller de afiladura de patines, enfatizo.
					
					Apunto que este patinadero debe ser construido como centro deportivo para el desarrollo del patinaje sobre el hielo del pais y la forja de constitucion fisica de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos. 
					
					El Patinadero al Aire Libre del Pueblo es otro regalo preparado por nuestro Partido para el pueblo, enfatizo e instruyo finalizar su construccion hasta el dia de victoria en la guerra al igual que el Complejo Ryugyongwon.
					
					El Comandante Supremo fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Jang Song Thaek, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, y Ryang Chong Song y Ma Won Chun, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la avenida Changjon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la avenida Changjon
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la avenida Changjon a punto de inauguracion. 
					En ella estan distribuidos armonicamente los apartamentos de 5 a 45 pisos, miles de viviendas con varias habitaciones, decenas de casas-cuna, jardines de infancia, escuelas secundarias, farmacias y otros establecimientos de educacion y salud publica, las redes de servicios comerciales y otras facilidades de servicios publicos e higienicos.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la zona de Mansudae, el Maximo Dirigente recorrio los restaurantes y tiendas, quioscos y parqueos subterraneos y otros lugares haciendo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion de la avenida Changjon.
					
					Se puso muy contento cuando recorrio varios puntos del Restaurante Haemaji construido en forma original. 
					
					En el restaurante combinado del municipio Jung, la casa de te Unjong y otros restaurantes construidos en diferentes formas averiguo la dimension, el mueblaje, la decoracion, la ventilacion y otras condiciones de ellos. 
					
					Sentado a una silla de restaurante, dijo que en el diseno y la fabricacion de cada mueble, hay que observar estrictamente el principio de pensar primero en la comodidad del pueblo, despues en la forma estetica. 
					
					Informandose minuciosamente del estado de reforestacion y de la calidad y colores de los adoquines en las vias que unen el suelo con el subsuelo, indico el rumbo y los remedios para hacer mas elegante y majestuosa la avenida Changjon.
					
					Al ver los disenos de los letreros de los establecimientos de servicios publicos de la avenida, enseno la manera de perfeccionarlos. 
					
					Al disfrutar el panorama de la avenida, lo califico de espectacular diciendo que ella se ha transformado de modo irreconocible. 
					
					La moderna avenida Changjon, construida magnificamente por cuenta propia a las alturas del nuevo siglo, manifiesta la justeza de la idea de nuestro Partido en materia de la estetica arquitectonica y la potencialidad de la economia independiente orientada en el Juche, destaco en tono orgulloso. 
					
					Volvio a evaluar que la avenida Changjon es perfecta tanto en el diseno como en el nivel de ejecucion y fijo la fecha de mudanza para mediados de junio. 
					
					Presento las tareas importantes que serviran de guia para acondicionar mas hermosa y majestuosamente a Pyongyang de acuerdo con la demanda de la era del Songun. 
					
					Hay que construir esta capital como una ciudad del pueblo donde sea establecida la concepcion revolucionaria del lider, enseno.
					
					Conforme a lo que exige la realidad en desarrollo, es preciso cumplir todos los quehaceres con vistas al futuro y de modo original, tales como la formacion de avenidas, la construccion de carreteras, la distribucion, la estructuracion y la decoracion interior de los edificios de distintos tipos, indico.
					
					Prosiguio que hace falta distribuir bien los establecimientos de educacion y asistencia medica y los otros de servicios deportivos, culturales e higienicos en el principio de asegurar el caracter popular, nacional y moderno.
					
					En la rama de construccion, deben seguir materializando consecuentemente la orientacion del Partido de garantizar el nivel plastico y artistico en la arquitectura, en particular, prestar profunda atencion a la creacion de areas verdes en la ciudad y otras condiciones del ambiente cultural, apunto. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Jang Song Thaek, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, y Ryang Chong Song, Pak Chun Hong y Ma Won Chun, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque de Atracciones Juventud de Kaeson
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque de Atracciones Juventud de Kaeson
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, averiguo el estado de administracion y operacion del Parque de Atracciones Juventud de Kaeson recorriendolo nuevamente.
					Se cercioro del funcionamiento de los equipos de diversiones que evocan las huellas de guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y aprecio que este parque de atracciones se mantiene normalmente muy limpio y en buen estado.
					
					Frente a la silla voladora, dijo que este equipo es el mas popular y lo habia usado cuando vino aqui en el ano pasado con el Dirigente.
					
					En el centro de juegos electronicos pregunto cuales son los equipos que prefieren los habitantes y propuso instalar en el Parque de Atracciones del Pueblo Rungna en plena construccion la silla voladora y los equipos de juegos electronicos.
					
					Se acerco al quiosco de la arepa de harina de trigo rellena y examino la calidad de la botella de agua mineral.
					
					Llegado a la Panaderia de Kaeson situada en el recinto del parque, dijo estar informado de que a los habitantes les gustan mucho los platos hechos en la panaderia y aprecio el excelente estado de ella.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il habia prometido visitar aqui en su vida, pero no pudo cumplir su palabra, dijo.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los funcionarios del parque normalizaran la operacion de los equipos de atracciones y de las redes de servicios publicos.
					
					Kim Jong Un presento las tareas que surgen en la administracion y la operacion del parque.
					
					Se debe dar buen mantenimiento tecnico a los equipos y mejorar el funcionamiento de estos para que los clientes no se sientan incomodos, indico.
					
					Hay que suministrar suficientes materias primas a las redes de servicio desplegadas en el parque para la operacion mas eficiente de ellas, instruyo.
					
					Es preciso prestar profunda atencion a los vestidos de los cuidadores y servidoras del parque y darles los uniformes de servicio por cada estacion del ano que armonicen con el panorama del parque.
					
					Encomendo cuidar y operar mejor el parque para que el amor por el pueblo del Dirigente llegue a todas las generaciones venideras y los habitantes puedan pasar aqui los momentos siempre divertidos.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios del parque y de la rama correspondiente cumpliran con su mision honrosa y deber de servidores verdaderos al pueblo, tomo una fotografia de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Jang Song Thaek, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, y Hwang Pyong So y Pak Chun Hong, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al mandaatario italiano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al mandatario italiano
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Italia sufrio muchas perdidas humanas y materiales por el terremoto, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio la vispera un mensaje de condolencias al presidente italiano Jorzo Napolitano.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso profunda compasion y consuelo al destinatario y a las victimas y deseo que el gobierno italiano elimine cuanto antes las secuelas del desastre natural y estabilice la vida de los habitantes de la zona sacudida.

articles.title: Elevemos vigilancia ante estrategia de dominio de alimentos de imperialismo
articles.content:
Elevemos vigilancia ante estrategia de dominio de alimentos de imperialismo
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- La crisis alimentaria amenaza a la humanidad del mundo.
					Unos mil millones de personas viven en inanicion y cada ano mueren millones de ninos por el hambre.
					
					Desde julio de 2010 hasta el mismo mes de 2011 el precio de cereales ascendio 71% mas en la arena internacional.
					
					Cada ano, mas de diez millones de ninos sufren la extrema inanicion, de entre el medio pierde sus vidas.
					
					El precio alimentario asciende constantemente y se incrementan dia a dia los que padecen de hambre.
					
					La crisis alimentaria en escala mundial se debe a la estrategia de dominio de alimentos del imperialismo.
					
					Los imperialistas hacen todos los medios y metodos para crear la confusion en la produccion y el sistema de suministro de alimentos de otros paises.
					
					Detras de la cortina de la fluctuacion del precio alimentario esta la politizacion de alimentos.
					
					La politizacion de alimentos tiene como objetivo utilizar esos materiales estrategicos como medio importante en materializar la estrategia exterior de un pais destinada a dar influencia a otros paises y mas adelante controlarlos.
					
					A mediados de la decada de 1970 el mundo acogio la epoca de precios bajos de alimentos gracias al incremento de la produccion agricola como resultado de la revolucion verde. Entonces los imperialistas controlando todos los alimentos, comenzo a preparar la guerra alimentaria que burla el destino de la humanidad.
					
					El proteccionismo comercial aplicado de manera obstinada por los paises occidentales es la representante politica de dominio alimentario.
					
					De acuerdo con esa politica, los paises occidentales impusieron altos aranceles en los productos agricolas de los paises en vias de desarrollo y bloquearon la aparicion de estos en sus mercados.
					
					Por otra parte, aplicaron el sistema de subsidios de exportacion para que sus productos agricolas se vendan en dumping en los mercados de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Como resultado, en los mercados internacionales de alimentos los productos de los paises en vias de desarrollo quedaron retirados completamente creando el desequilibrio grave y el Occidente llego a coordinar a su antojo el precio alimentario controlando el mercado.
					
					Se incremento el numero de los paises que no invertian en la agricultura nacional sino importaban los alimentos "baratos" o recibian apoyo del Occidente.
					
					Entonces bajo el pretexto de "apoyo" y "socorro de deuda", los imperialistas utilizaron como cebo los "excedentes agricolas", creados por el proteccionismo comercial, para imponer a los paises en vias de desarrollo la concepcion de valor occidental.
					
					La perdida de tal "ayuda" y "socorro de deuda" no llega un cuarto o un quinto de los danos sufridos por los paises subdesarrollados debido a los negocios injustos con los occidentales.
					
					El saqueo de tierras laborables por parte de los capitalistas monopolistas es otro motivo que causa la subida repentina de los precios de alimentos perjudicando gravemente la produccion alimentaria del mundo.
					
					Debido a tales maniobras de caracter usurpador, los imperialistas occidentales ocuparon la mayoria de la produccion de alimentos del mundo, mientras numerosos paises en vias de desarrollo, incluyendo los africanos que eran exportadores importantes de cereales en las decadas de 1960 y 1970, se convirtieron en los importadores.
					
					La produccion de combustibles biologicos que libran en gran escala EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales agrava mas la crisis alimentaria.
					
					EE.UU. gasta cada ano 6 mil millones de USD como subsidios y la Europa, 4 mil millones de euros en instigar la carrera de los monopolios en materia de produccion de combustibles biologicos.
					
					Segun trascendidos, actualmente el combustible lleno para un coche normal equivale a 200 kilogramos de maiz.
					
					Asi, las maquinas de EE.UU. y Europa consumen los alimentos necesarios para quinientos millones de la poblacion.
					
					A causa de produccion en avalancha de combustibles biologicos, la cantidad de almacenamiento de alimentos del mundo para 2007 rebajo en el nivel mas bajo durante varios decenios y al contrario subio repentinamente el precio de alimentos.
					
					El blanco principal de la politica de combustibles biologicos que practican EE.UU. y el Occidente son los paises productores de petroleo de la OPEC. Esto es una opinion unanime de los observadores interesados.
					
					El capitalismo de monopolios nacionales, que se basa en la ley de selvas y que crea la especulacion desordenada y extremada confusion, es autor directo del desastre alimentario actual.
					
					Cuando la crisis financiera surgida en 2008 en EE.UU. por el derrumbe de esponja de inmuebles afecto todo el mundo capitalista, los capitalistas monopolistas decidieron invertir fondos en los alimentos en lugar de los metales y energia, cuyo anticipo es caro y peligroso.
					
					Aprovechando la inestabilidad alimentaria, diversos monopolios se lanzaron en la especulacion de alimentos.
					
					Como resultado, se promovio la mercantilizacion alimentaria y se creo una gran fluctuacion del precio alimentario. 
					
					Solo los capitalistas monopolistas se hicieron mas ricos a costa del desastre alimentario de la humanidad.
					
					Hoy en dia, en que los imperialistas intentan promover y ampliar la crisis alimentaria para apretar a la humanidad y subyugar a otros paises y naciones, resolver el problema alimentario esta relacionado con el de defender la soberania y dignidad.
					
					Es la ley estar insatisfecho con el arroz ajeno.
					
					El remedio solo esta en autoabastecerse de alimentos y prestar los esfuerzos comunes para hacer frente al desafio de los imperialistas.
					
					Hay que poner inmensos esfuerzos en la agricultura independiente.
